text: Ton Thie (28 October 1944 â€“ 25 February 2021) was a Dutch professional footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for Excelsior, Hermes DVS, ADO Den Haag, the San Francisco Golden Gate Gales, and GC & FC Olympia. He was born in The Hague, Netherlands. His career lasted from 1962 to 1979. Thie died on 25 February 2021 in Gambia, aged 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from The Hague
title: Ton Thie
